Southeastern and Govia Thameslink have brought in new timetables in response to a large fall in commuting since the pandemic. 
Southeastern said it was also scrapping first class on its services bet… [+1881 chars]

articles.author: Ben Summer
articles.title: 'I won't be bothering' - the people cutting back on Christmas in the cost of living crisis - Wales Online
articles.description: "I just feel sorry for people who have got little ones and they've got to buy presents for them"
articles.content: Christmas is two weeks away, but for some people it represents financial anxiety more than festive joy. Almost 50% of people are looking to cut back on their spending on presents this year, with more… [+5311 chars]
